title: Can I get end of season rewards
body: Is there a way that I can see if i can get end of season rewards im gold 5 0 lp and had a suspension sometime in the past I dont remember when Is there a way to see if im good and if not is there a way to negotiate that lol {{champion:28}}

replies.body: It looks like your last 14-day ban was after 8/22 which means this account was disqualified from end of season rewards.
